message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I know you're interested in. I'm asking for $120 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. However, I am only willing to pay $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a good offer, I'm looking for something a bit closer to $105.  That would still leave you a good deal since it's well below the value of the product for you. Let's see if we can find a way to make this work.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am unable to go above $95 for this product. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
